string.value: I've completed all Bounty Hunter bounties for Lita Lawless! I think its about time I'm deputized! I should head to New Leaf City and find out more!
I spoke with Lita, and she's all set to deputize me whenever I'm ready! Completing all those quests was hard, but well worth the effort!

I've been deputized by Lita Lawless as an official protector of New Leaf City! I've sworn to defend the area, and Masteria in general from all future threats...and from what it looks like, there's going to be a lot of them!
Well, well, well! You've certainly proved yourself as an ardent hunter! In return for your efforts, I'm going to deputize you as an official protector of New Leaf City!
Ok, ok. Let's not go overboard here-this isn't some award you can hang on a wall-it's something that designates you as a guardian of the city, and whenever I summon you, you must answer the call.
Oh ok, let me know when you're good and ready to receive this honor!
By the power vested in me as Sheriff of New Leaf City, I hereby deputize you as a Protector of New Leaf City!
